p: These results indicate the superiority of the bromo isatin 5d and the methoxy isatin 5f derivatives on both kinases ( Table 2). The methyl isatin derivative 5e shows a relatively less kinase inhibitory activity than its bromo 5d and methoxy 5f congeners on both kinases despite of its obvious potent cellular cytotoxicity which could be attributed to its probable further cytotoxic mechanisms besides CDK2/GSK-3Î² dual inhibition.
